page.title: 10COWBIT ENDOWED SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is 273 years old. It has two classes. There is an old school house and a playground and a garden. It is a church school standing beside St. Marys Church. A man called Thomas Andrew gave the land and William Guy built the school in 1712. Cowbit only has 50 pupils and school begins at 09.00hrs and finishes at 15.30.We learn Maths,English,Story writing,Handwriting,Sounds,Dictionary work,Reading,Art,Music and project folders.We also have a swimming lesson once a week when the whole school goes to Spalding on a coach to the Swimming Pool. P.E. is also once a week. We go to church about once a term when our vicar takes special services at Easter, School Leavers, Harvest and Christmas.
